name: Federation of European Neuroscience Societies
goal:
FENS works for the public benefit to advance research and to develop neuroscience education in Europe.

For this purpose the society aims to
1) promote interaction and coordination between its member societies and to develop neuroscience research across nations and disciplines
2) facilitate the interaction between neuroscientists and related scientists
in Europe and outside Europe
3) facilitate the dissemination of scientific information
4) support education and training of young neuroscience researchers
5) promote understanding and involvement in neuroscience among the general public and advise decision-makers on the importance of neuroscience research
interests: Education, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Cost of Brain Disorders, Funding and research on brain and neuroscience, Support of the European Directive 2010/63/EU on the protection of animals used for scientific purposes
